languages.text: "Иногда. Редко. Да и если подумать — зачем мне это? Тут есть все, что мне нужно. Все шепоты, что слышу, привычные, почти родные. А о кошмарах за бортом я могу за {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасеком{/g} послушать". {n}Идира морщится и потирает глаза.{/n} "Вы только не подумайте — если надо, я за вами хоть на край галактики".

traits.locale_text: "Иногда. Редко. Да и если подумать — зачем мне это? Тут есть все, что мне нужно. Все шепоты, что слышу, привычные, почти родные. А о кошмарах за бортом я могу за {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасеком{/g} послушать". {n}Идира морщится и потирает глаза.{/n} "Вы только не подумайте — если надо, я за вами хоть на край галактики".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "A few times. Not many. And if I think about it — why would I want to? I've got everything I need here. All the whispers I hear are familiar ones, they almost feel like family. And if I want to hear about the nightmares off the ship, I can, after some {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}." {n}Idira winces and rubs her eyes.{/n} "But don't go getting the wrong idea — if I have to, I'll follow you to the edge of the galaxy."
languages.original_text: "Иногда. Редко. Да и если подумать — зачем мне это? Тут есть все, что мне нужно. Все шепоты, что слышу, привычные, почти родные. А о кошмарах за бортом я могу за {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасеком{/g} послушать". {n}Идира морщится и потирает глаза.{/n} "Вы только не подумайте — если надо, я за вами хоть на край галактики".

And if I want to hear about the nightmares off the ship, I can, after some {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}." {n}Idira winces and rubs her eyes.{/n} "But don't go getting the wrong idea — if I have to, I'll follow you to the edge of the galaxy."

And if I want to hear about the nightmares off the ship, I can, after some {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}." {n}Idira winces and rubs her eyes.{/n} "But don't go getting the wrong idea — if I have to, I'll follow you to the edge of the galaxy."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “下过几次，不是很多。而且仔细想想的话，我为什么要下船呢？我在这里已经得到了我想要的一切。我听到的所有耳语都很熟悉，那些声音几乎就像我的家人一样。如果我想听听船外的噩梦的话，只要来上几杯{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}艾玛赛克酒{/g}，我就能听得到了。”{n}伊迪拉皱起了眉，揉了揉眼睛。{/n}“但不要误会了我的意思。如果有必要的话，我会追随你到银河系的边境。”
languages.original_text: "A few times. Not many. And if I think about it — why would I want to? I've got everything I need here. All the whispers I hear are familiar ones, they almost feel like family. And if I want to hear about the nightmares off the ship, I can, after some {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}." {n}Idira winces and rubs her eyes.{/n} "But don't go getting the wrong idea — if I have to, I'll follow you to the edge of the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: “下过几次，不是很多。而且仔细想想的话，我为什么要下船呢？我在这里已经得到了我想要的一切。我听到的所有耳语都很熟悉，那些声音几乎就像我的家人一样。如果我想听听船外的噩梦的话，只要来上几杯{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}艾玛赛克酒{/g}，我就能听得到了。”{n}伊迪拉皱起了眉，揉了揉眼睛。{/n}“但不要误会了我的意思。如果有必要的话，我会追随你到银河系的边境。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "A few times. Not many. And if I think about it — why would I want to? I've got everything I need here. All the whispers I hear are familiar ones, they almost feel like family. And if I want to hear about the nightmares off the ship, I can, after some amasec." {n}Idira winces and rubs her eyes.{/n} "But don't go getting the wrong idea — if I have to, I'll follow you to the edge of the galaxy."

languages.text: «Algunas veces. No muchas. Si lo pienso, ¿para qué quiero salir? Aquí dentro tengo todo lo que quiero. Los susurros que oigo me son conocidos; son prácticamente familia. Y si quiero saber algo sobre las pesadillas que esperan fuera de la nave, también puedo descubrirlo con un poco de {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}». {n}Idira hace una mueca y se frota los ojos.{/n} «Pero no se equivoque: si es necesario, {mf|le|la} seguiré hasta el fin de la galaxia».
languages.original_text: "A few times. Not many. And if I think about it — why would I want to? I've got everything I need here. All the whispers I hear are familiar ones, they almost feel like family. And if I want to hear about the nightmares off the ship, I can, after some {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}." {n}Idira winces and rubs her eyes.{/n} "But don't go getting the wrong idea — if I have to, I'll follow you to the edge of the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: «Algunas veces. No muchas. Si lo pienso, ¿para qué quiero salir? Aquí dentro tengo todo lo que quiero. Los susurros que oigo me son conocidos; son prácticamente familia. Y si quiero saber algo sobre las pesadillas que esperan fuera de la nave, también puedo descubrirlo con un poco de {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}». {n}Idira hace una mueca y se frota los ojos.{/n} «Pero no se equivoque: si es necesario, {mf|le|la} seguiré hasta el fin de la galaxia».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「数回。そんなに多くはないわ。考えてみれば…なぜそうしたいのかしら？必要なものはすべてここにある。聞こえてくるささやき声は、どれも馴染みのあるものばかりで、まるで家族のように感じるの。それに、船の外で悪夢について聞きたくなったら、{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}アマセック{/g}の後に…」{n}イディラはうずくまり、目をこすった。{/n}「でも誤解しないで。必要なら、銀河の果てまであなたについていくわ」
languages.original_text: "A few times. Not many. And if I think about it — why would I want to? I've got everything I need here. All the whispers I hear are familiar ones, they almost feel like family. And if I want to hear about the nightmares off the ship, I can, after some {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}." {n}Idira winces and rubs her eyes.{/n} "But don't go getting the wrong idea — if I have to, I'll follow you to the edge of the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: 「数回。そんなに多くはないわ。考えてみれば…なぜそうしたいのかしら？必要なものはすべてここにある。聞こえてくるささやき声は、どれも馴染みのあるものばかりで、まるで家族のように感じるの。それに、船の外で悪夢について聞きたくなったら、{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}アマセック{/g}の後に…」{n}イディラはうずくまり、目をこすった。{/n}「でも誤解しないで。必要なら、銀河の果てまであなたについていくわ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Einige Male. Nicht oft. Und wenn ich so darüber nachdenke — warum sollte ich das wollen? Ich habe hier alles, was ich brauche. All die flüsternden Stimmen, die ich höre, sind mir vertraut. Sie fühlen sich fast wie meine Familie an. Und wenn ich von den Albträumen außerhalb des Schiffs höre, kann ich das, nach ein wenig {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g}." {n}Idira verzieht das Gesicht und reibt sich die Augen.{/n} "Aber versteht mich nicht falsch — wenn es sein muss, folge ich Euch bis an den Rand der Galaxie."
languages.original_text: "A few times. Not many. And if I think about it — why would I want to? I've got everything I need here. All the whispers I hear are familiar ones, they almost feel like family. And if I want to hear about the nightmares off the ship, I can, after some {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}." {n}Idira winces and rubs her eyes.{/n} "But don't go getting the wrong idea — if I have to, I'll follow you to the edge of the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: "Einige Male. Nicht oft. Und wenn ich so darüber nachdenke — warum sollte ich das wollen? Ich habe hier alles, was ich brauche. All die flüsternden Stimmen, die ich höre, sind mir vertraut. Sie fühlen sich fast wie meine Familie an. Und wenn ich von den Albträumen außerhalb des Schiffs höre, kann ich das, nach ein wenig {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g}." {n}Idira verzieht das Gesicht und reibt sich die Augen.{/n} "Aber versteht mich nicht falsch — wenn es sein muss, folge ich Euch bis an den Rand der Galaxie."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Ça m'est arrivé, mais ça reste rare. Franchement, je n'en vois pas vraiment l'intérêt. J'ai tout ce qu'il me faut ici. Tous les murmures me sont familiers, à tel point que je les considère presque comme ma famille. Et si je veux entendre les cauchemars qui rôdent hors du vaisseau, je n'ai qu'à me siffler un peu d'{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}, {n}déclare Idira en se frottant les yeux.{/n} Mais ne vous méprenez pas : s'il le faut, je vous suivrai jusqu'aux confins de la galaxie. »
languages.original_text: "A few times. Not many. And if I think about it — why would I want to? I've got everything I need here. All the whispers I hear are familiar ones, they almost feel like family. And if I want to hear about the nightmares off the ship, I can, after some {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}." {n}Idira winces and rubs her eyes.{/n} "But don't go getting the wrong idea — if I have to, I'll follow you to the edge of the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: « Ça m'est arrivé, mais ça reste rare. Franchement, je n'en vois pas vraiment l'intérêt. J'ai tout ce qu'il me faut ici. Tous les murmures me sont familiers, à tel point que je les considère presque comme ma famille. Et si je veux entendre les cauchemars qui rôdent hors du vaisseau, je n'ai qu'à me siffler un peu d'{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}, {n}déclare Idira en se frottant les yeux.{/n} Mais ne vous méprenez pas : s'il le faut, je vous suivrai jusqu'aux confins de la galaxie. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Birkaç kez. Çok değil. Aslında düşününce... Neden ayrılayım ki? İhtiyacım olan her şey burada. Duyduğum tüm fısıltılar tanıdık, âdeta ailem gibiler. Geminin dışında gizlenen kâbusları duymak istersem de bir iki kadeh {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasek{/g} yuvarladım mı tamamdır." {n}İdira, yüzünü buruşturup gözlerini ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Yanlış anlama tabii ki. Gerekirse seninle galaksinin sonuna kadar giderim."
languages.original_text: "A few times. Not many. And if I think about it — why would I want to? I've got everything I need here. All the whispers I hear are familiar ones, they almost feel like family. And if I want to hear about the nightmares off the ship, I can, after some {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}." {n}Idira winces and rubs her eyes.{/n} "But don't go getting the wrong idea — if I have to, I'll follow you to the edge of the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: "Birkaç defa ama çok olmadı. Şimdi düşündüm de... Neden ayrılayım ki? İhtiyacım olan her şey burada. Duyduğum tüm fısıltılara aşinayım, âdeta ailem gibiler. Canım geminin dışındaki kâbustan çıkma sesleri duymak isterse de biraz {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasek{/g} alır çıkarım." {n}İdira irkilerek gözlerini ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Ancak yanlış anlamanı istemem. Gerekirse seninle galaksinin sonuna kadar gelirim."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
